dcterms:description: PatchDB presents an extensive array of patches written in C/C++, consisting of 12K security-focused and 24K general patches. This dataset combines patches derived from NVD reference links and direct GitHub commits from 311 notable open-source projects, including the Linux kernel, MySQL, and OpenSSL.
dcterms:title: PatchDB

dcterms:creator: Yaqin Zhou
Jing Kai Siow
Chenyu Wang
Shangqing Liu
Yang Liu
dcterms:description: SPI-DB concentrates on patches from projects such as Linux, FFmpeg, Wire-shark, and QEMU, with publicly accessible information related to FFmpeg and QEMU, amassing 25,790 patches (10K security and 15K non-security).
dcterms:title: SPI-DB
